mapper.select: SELECT id, parent_id, `order`, label_zh, label_en, comment FROM ieltsnote.translation_category order by if(ISNULL(`order`), 0, `order`) asc, label_en
mapper.insert: insert into ieltsnote.translation_category (parent_id, label_zh, label_en) values (#{parentId}, #{labelZh}, #{labelEn})
insert into ieltsnote.translation_category (parent_id, label_zh, label_en) values (#{id}, #{labelZh}, #{labelEn})
mapper.select: select cace.category, cace.id expression_id, cace.expression_zh, cace.expression_en, cace.comment expression_comment, cace.creator expression_creator, cace.create_time expression_create_time, cace.update_time expression_update_time, cacs.uid sample_id, cacs.sample_zh, cacs.sample_en, cacs.comment sample_comment, cacs.creator sample_creator, cacs.create_time sample_create_time, cacs.update_time sample_update_time from translation_expression cace left join translation_sample cacs on cace.id = cacs.id where cace.category = #{id} order by expression_en
mapper.insert: insert into ieltsnote.translation_expression (category, expression_zh, expression_en, comment, creator, create_time) values (#{category}, #{expressionZh}, #{expressionEn}, #{expressionComment}, #{expressionCreator}, NOW())
insert into ieltsnote.translation_sample (id, sample_zh, sample_en, comment, creator, create_time) values (#{expressionId}, #{sampleZh}, #{sampleEn}, #{sampleComment}, #{sampleCreator}, NOW())
mapper.select: select B.practice_day, sum(if(B.part = 1, B.question_cnt, 0)) as zh_to_en, sum(if(B.part = 2, B.question_cnt, 0)) as en_to_zh from ( select sl.part, count(distinct question_id) question_cnt, DATE_FORMAT(log_time, '%Y-%m-%d') practice_day from translation_log sl where creator = #{creator} group by practice_day, sl.part ) as B group by B.practice_day
